answers.answer: Depending on how bad it is sometimes they'll induce you before your due date.
I was diagnosed with preeclampsia with my first son and as soon as they diagnosed me I was sent to labor and delivery to be induced.

I have pre-eclampsia, and I am 26weeks 4days pregnant. I have been hospitalized twice so far, and drink meds 3 times a day. Also have to check my bp at least 4x a day.The only 'cure' for it is delivery.
Was the baby okay after delivery ? Did you/or him have to undergo any treatments or anything , did you have to stay in the hospital longer?

I had pre-eclampsia & had to be induced. My blood pressure was literally thru the roof.... 280/120. They put me on magnesium during labor & a short time after. My baby girl was still very healthy & we left the hospital on time. We didn't have to stay a minute longer.
Thanks for all the feed back I kind of been stressing since I left my appointment I feel a lot batter about everything now

question: 38 weeks + 4 days , could possibly have preeclampsia has this happen to anyone ? And if so what was the process after diagnosed with being so close ?
title: Preeclampsia
